text: The Honda Ye P7 and The Honda Ye S7 are two Electric mid-size Crossover SUVS made by Honda through the GAC Honda and Dongfeng Honda joint ventures since 2024. == History and Features == The two SUVS were both shown at the Auto China in April 2024. The Ye P7 and The Ye S7 are the first cars from the Honda Ye sub-brand and they are from a new line of electric cars and made both by GAC Honda and Dongfeng Honda. Both cars have a 89.6 kWh battery with 350 kW (469 hp) and a range of 620 km (385 mi). == Markets == The Honda Ye P7 and The Honda Ye S7 are sold exclusively on the Chinese market. == References == Category:Honda automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Honda Ye P7
